title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.12 - Town of Lockport
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.12 - Town of Lockport

State Regulations
(a) Bear Ridge

Road. The northeastbound and southwestbound roadways of Bear Ridge Road between

Robinson Road and Ohio Street; provided, however, that Bear Ridge Road is
designated as an access highway for use by tandem trailer combinations only, and is not hereby designated as an access highway for any other types of
vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8129.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
